eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A LOCAL AREA EMERGENCY FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Quay, NM; AT 04:08 AM ON NOV 20, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 04:01 AM NOV 21, 2025. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: Quay County OEM: I-40 Westbound is closed at MM 315 due to Crash. This will cause significant delays in the area. Please use alternate routes if possible and exercise caution while driving. For more information, visit NMRoads.com. Avoid  area.
